p: For the SSNQ, each participant was asked to name up to 10 persons whom he could rely on for functional support using four domains. In addition, participants were asked about their partners with whom they had anal or vaginal sex in the last 3 months using a name generator with up to 15 sex partners. Detailed questions were asked about each named sexual partner, including socio-demographics, partner type, where participant met the partner, frequency of anal or vaginal sex and condom use with sex with the partner in the last 3 months, and specific drug or alcohol use during anal sex with or without condom use in the last 3 months with the partner.
